root.name: Dinopark Tycoon
root.description: Dinosaurs Available in Game:-cost of Dinosaur in parenthesis.Carnivores (meat eating):Albertosaurus ($3,400)Allosaurus ($4,250)Coelophysis ($1,250)Deinonychus ($1,250)Ornithomimus ($1,250)Tyrannosaurus ($9,750)Herbivores (plant eating):Ankylosaurus ($5,750)Apatosaurus ($8,750)Corythosaurus ($7,250)Diplodocus ($9,250)Edmontosaurus ($6,000)Hadrosaurus ($3,500)Hypsilophodon ($1,500)Iguanodon ($8,500)Panoplosaurus ($3,250)Pentaceratops ($1,750)Saurolophus ($5,500)Stegosaurus ($3,250)Triceratops ($7,500)Fictional:Vegasaurus - the most expensive of all the dinosaurs, worth $25,000. Mixed results have occured with the dinosaur, some claiming the egg would break on the machine and cause the dinosaur to become extinct. Other's have claimed that typing in 'vegasaurus' or 'iwantavegasaurus' during gameplay would allow a user to buy the dinosaur.
